metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010060 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
NASA CFITSIO prior to 3.43 is affected by: Buffer Overflow. The impact is:arbitrary code execution. The component is: over 40 source code files werechanged. The attack vector is: remote unauthenticated attacker. The fixedversion is: 3.43. NOTE: this CVE refers to the issues not covered byCVE-2018-3846, CVE-2018-3847, CVE-2018-3848, and CVE-2018-3849. One exampleis ftp_status in drvrnet.c mishandling a long string beginning with a '4'character.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-1010060` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcfitsio-bin - 3.430-2
libcfitsio5 - 3.430-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cfitsio package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.430-2').
